Articles.Content:
I need help. How can I update KSP 1.2? Is the first time I had a update and I had two folders on the "Common" Folder of Steam. I had, One of KSP 1.1.3 and the other of KSP 1.2. But when I open the KSP 1.2 it opens and then it closes quickly or even instantly and I can just open the KSP 1.1.3 Folder. Did someone knows how to update and to enjoy KSP 1.2? Please. I think most of you knew how to do it.

Edited October 26, 2016 by SpaceastronautX

Moved over to Technical Support.

You should not have two folders in the Common folder. I would copy both to someplace else on your hard disk, then have Steam delete the local content. After that, remove any KSP folders in Common, then have Steam install the game fresh.
